item.title: Philippines Plane Crash Kills U.S. Service Member and 3 Contractors
item.description: The plane, which had been contracted by the Pentagon, went down during a routine mission in the southern Philippines, the U.S. military said.

item.title: Dozens of Clinical Trials Have Been Frozen in Response to Trump’s USAID Order
